attributes.action: change incapacity benefit forms, to be easyer for people with medical illnesses to claim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a suffer of fibromyalgia illness, I/we as suffers do not think its fair to put us through stressfull benefit medical examinations,causeing our illness to flare up,it is an unpredictable/uncurable, life changing illness, with many symptoms sufferd everyday,please make benefit claims easyer for us,as they are for alcholics/drug abussers,we do not choose to be ill or unfit for work,miss emma lester,
